## JsPlumbInstance.setElementPosition() method

Sets the position of the given element to be \[x,y\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setElementPosition(el: T["E"], x: number, y: number): RedrawResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | T\["E"\] | Element to set the position for |
|  x | number | Position in X axis |
|  y | number | Position in Y axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RedrawResult](./core.redrawresult.md)

The result of the redraw operation that follows the update of the viewport.
